events.name: Exit
events.note: <Spawn on Player>

parameters: Would you like to return to the surface?
Insert a "Transfer Player" event command here
on where you want to go.

events.name: Goal
events.note: <Spawn Region: 2> <Not Cell with Event: Exit>

parameters: Would you like to go to level 2?
Adjust any settings you may deem fit here.
